data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kerr, Peter H. (2011): Six new species of Acomoptera from North America (Diptera, Mycetophilidae). ZooKeys 137: 41-76, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.137.1764, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.137.1764
